status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6fipb","text":"Weigh about   of Boric acid into a weighing boat and place the weighing boat in a vacuum tupperware half-filled with silica gel beads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":12,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f9tkc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aj9gr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4iopv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"35","error":false,"guid":"698C7560DDB311EC9CDA1F0A3FA17E69","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":6}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"df4ln","text":"Close the tupperware and use the vacuum pump to create a vacuum until you are not able to hand pump any more air out or the pump shuts off.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"79sb8","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ctm63","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"183nh","text":"Check instructions for your vacuum pump system to understand when a vacuum has been formed and when to stop pumping.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7mgkt","text":"Allow it to stay overnight at room temperature ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"pbej","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c6pc7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4bpn2","text":"This step ensures no moisture is carried over into the final powder mixture. The powders readily absorb moisture from the atmosphere and this can reduce their shelf life.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5l2uo","text":"Weigh out   of  from the pre-dried powder into a   beaker.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":10,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":15,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":49,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d7f5a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"27.515","error":false,"guid":"6D0B14D0DDB311EC9CDA1F0A3FA17E69","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":6}},"1":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":955791,"mol_weight":0,"name":"Borax","linfor":"","url":"","sku":"","cas_number":"1303-96-4","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"879CF3C0EBDE11ECB8DE5946DF8D21ED","in_steps":null,"vendor":{"id":1,"name":"Contributed by users","link":"https://www.protocols.io","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/1.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/1.png"}}}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"703BBB50DDB311EC9CDA1F0A3FA17E69","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7ld4p","text":"Weigh   of  and add into the beaker","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":6,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":10,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cbca6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"3.72","error":false,"guid":"720CD1D0DDB311EC9CDA1F0A3FA17E69","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":6}},"1":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":955792,"mol_weight":0,"name":" EDTA DiSodium salt anhydrate","linfor":"","url":"","sku":"","cas_number":"6381-92-6","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"B7F76180EBDF11ECB8DE5946DF8D21ED","in_steps":null,"vendor":{"id":17,"name":"Sigma Aldrich","link":"http://sigmaaldrich.com","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b4me5","text":"Weigh   of and add to the content of the beaker.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":6,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":10,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eo8o6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"53.905","error":false,"guid":"73F17050DDB311EC9CDA1F0A3FA17E69","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":6}},"1":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":955793,"mol_weight":0,"name":"Tris base","linfor":"","url":"","sku":"","cas_number":"77-86-1","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"F1D4C410EBDF11ECB8DE5946DF8D21ED","in_steps":null,"vendor":{"id":1,"name":"Contributed by users","link":"https://www.protocols.io","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/1.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/1.png"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8espd","text":"Use a spatula to stir so as to have an even and a uniform mixture of all three powders.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"75ikc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6l8rc","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f6fsr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1dh61","text":"If scaling up the protocol, stirring may be insufficient and you may want to vigorously agitate in a close container to ensure that the powders are evenly mixed.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2vm1e","text":"Transfer the powder mix into a zip lock antistatic bag, seal carefully and label appropriately as powder to make up   of 10x TBE.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":116,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b5c7q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.5","error":false,"guid":"865D03D0DDB311EC9CDA1F0A3FA17E69","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"73fqo","text":"The powder is stable for up to 6 months.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b7gsn","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"98ucc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ml84","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5rvoc","text":"For long term storage, keep the pouches in a secondary container like a larger tupperware box with dessicant to help absorb any extra moisture from the atmosphere.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"df15v","text":"Work in well ventilated area and weigh face masks and googles to avoid inhaling the powders or powder from entering the eye.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
